data.message: Hey listen Slim Jim all my friends are dropping dead like flies from overdoses including my ex girlfriend Brooklyn Mcneil who just kicked the wheel recently too. She died in an alley way at twenty two years of rage. The reason why I'm telling you this man is not only because I'm a slim shady fan, but it's also because if Marilyn Mansons manager who I'm going to call up tomorrow to talk to about a game I've been creating titled: Marilyn Mansions doesn't decide to help me out, you may be my only other option or hope of getting somewhere of getting famous or discovered if I have any hope at all of getting anywhere.
